synopsis.text: Zi plining through time, the formidable supervillain Ling Chen, also known as Penrose, finds himself unexpectedly thrust back to his high school days in 2030 during a heated battle with his sworn nemesis, the superhero Ye Zimu. As he reconnects with his beloved aunt, Ling Chen realizes the incredible opportunity he's been given: a chance to rewrite history and safeguard those he holds dear, including the aunt who met a tragic end at the hands of Ye Zimu in his previous life. With the clock reset, Ling Chen vows to alter the course of destiny, determined to neutralize the threat posed by Ye Zimu before it fully materializes. As he navigates the complexities of this new timeline, Ling Chen becomes resolute in his mission to protect his loved ones and prevent the impending catastrophe, proving that even a villain can have a change of heart.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
